channel.title: Python Test Parameters Parameterized on Tzach Solomon's Blog

item.title: Creating parameterized test python
item.description: General A friend asked if I know how to create a test in python that with parameters feeded into it from outside. From what I’ve seen there is no possible way to do that. Instead what you could do is create a configuration file and read it your test. Source code Check the source code and how to at https://github.com/tzachs/ParamTestPython
